title: Challenger Ahri rushes into the 2015 season!

replies.body: If you managed to get 20 death before 20, you will receive a secret "challenged" skin.
That counts, only 19 to go m8. GL&HF!
i just tried it and it didn't work is there a certain one that u have to play like PvP, bots or custom?
try re logging in. that's what happened to me with popstar
He means when we first started playing LoL, we kept dying. xD So we should have received a free skin
No how can you not understand, Its if you die 20 times before 20 minutes your mentally challenged just like you

I think he actually means: if you die 20 times before 20 minutes in a game you should receive a challenged skin to show off your durpness.

It's not a serious thing. It's taking the piss. It's making a joke on the name "Challenger" Ahri.
jeez we all should have gotten a skin when we first started then
I think the people responding to his comment with confusion, all deserve the "Challenged Ahri" skin!
HAHAHA all the people that fell for it XD oh my
nobody fell for it, you fell for a bait.{{summoner:14}}
